entities.name: frank bryce
entities.description: Frank Bryce is introduced as the Riddles' gardener who lived alone in a rundown cottage on the grounds of the Riddle House. He had come back from the war with a stiff leg and a great dislike of crowds and loud noises.

relationships.description: Frank Bryce is introduced as the Riddles' gardener, indicating that he works for them.
It is mentioned that Frank had come back from the war with a stiff leg and a great dislike of crowds and loud noises, indicating that he was a veteran of the war.
